articles.title: Bank of Baroda posts net profit of ₹1,779 cr in fourth quarter
articles.description: The net interest income grew 21% to  ₹8,612 crore in the fourth quarter.
articles.content: Bank of Baroda has reported a net profit of 1,779 crore in three months to March. This compares with a loss of 1,046 crore in the last year period.

articles.title: LIC Housing Finance hikes home loan interest rate by up to 40 bps. Details here
articles.description: The LIC Housing Finance in its statement said that for borrowers with CIBIL score of 700 and above, the rate hike has been limited to only 20 bps
articles.content: Mortgage financier LIC Housing Finance (LIC HFL) on Friday increased interest rate on home loans by 20 basis points to 6.9%, from 6.7%, for select borrowers, according to news agency PTI report.
